programme.title: Nashville
programme.sub-title: Your Wild Life's Gonna Get You Down
programme.desc: Rayna's girls meet Luke's son Colt; Juliette becomes more and more jealous; Gunnar refuses to support Will and Layla's plan; Maddie is forbidden to go to Deacon's concert.

programme.title: Nashville
programme.desc: When news about Maddie causes a media frenzy, Rayna appears on "Good Morning America" in hope of managing the fallout; Juliette asks Charlie Wentworth for help filling seats on her tour; Scarlett receives a surprise visit from her mother.

programme.title: Nashville
programme.sub-title: Your Good Girl's Gonna Go Bad
programme.desc: Scarlett's breakdown drives everyone to pin blame on each other; Juliette turns to Avery but finds him preoccupied by Scarlett.

programme.title: Nashville
programme.desc: After learning that Luke has been injured in Afghanistan and must cut his tour short, Rayna arranges a charity concert at Fort Campbell; Maddie and Deacon's new course for the future brings them closer together; Juliette struggles with guilt.

programme.title: Nashville
programme.desc: As Will Lexington's album climbs the charts, Rayna plans a free concert to draw attention to hers; Zoey, Avery and Gunnar perform at a benefit; Scarlett makes a decision about her future.

programme.title: Nashville
programme.desc: Rayna must choose between two men and two directions her life could take; Juliette auditions for a film role; Scarlett takes a trip home; Will and Layla deal with the fallout from his confession.

programme.title: Nashville
programme.sub-title: How Far Down Can I Go
programme.desc: Rayna pursues new publicity opportunities to promote her album and record label; Layla pressures Will to help her rebuild her fleeting career; Juliette gets ready for a big audition while dealing with life-changing news.

programme.title: Nashville
programme.sub-title: I Can't Get Over You to Save My Life
programme.desc: Rayna sets a wedding date; Juliette works to hide the secret that could prevent her from getting a movie role; Luke's new back-up singer asserts her presence; Gunnar gets a visit from a past love; Layla uses her power over Will.

programme.title: Nashville
programme.desc: Rayna invites Sadie Stone for a day on the town in an effort to sign her to Highway 65; Juliette struggles to conceal her pregnancy; a backup singer takes an interest in Deacon; Avery tries to drown his sorrows in alcohol.

programme.title: Nashville
programme.desc: Juliette has concerns before filming a sex scene with Noah West (Derek Hough); Rayna realizes her heightened level of fame is making Maddie miserable and leaving Daphne feeling entitled; Will makes careless mistakes.

programme.title: Nashville
programme.sub-title: Nobody Said It Was Going to Be Easy
programme.desc: A health scare prompts Juliette to ask Avery if he wants to be a part of the baby's life; Gunnar turns to Scarlett for advice; a CMA Awards nomination pits Rayna and Luke against each other; news of Daphne and Maddie's bad behavior gets to Rayna.

programme.title: Nashville
programme.desc: Rayna realizes she may have allowed too much public access into her life; Juliette prepares for motherhood alone; Layla and Will brace themselves for the premiere of their reality show.

programme.title: Nashville
programme.desc: While at the 48th Annual CMA Awards in Nashville, Rayna finds Luke's prenuptial agreement, causing friction; Avery introduces his parents to Juliette; Gunnar and Zoey's relationship is put to the test.

programme.title: Nashville
programme.desc: Rayna agrees to broadcast a Christmas special from her home; Zoey, Gunnar and Avery have the opportunity to perform at Winterfest; Terry has a successful performance but cannot handle the limelight.

programme.title: Nashville
programme.sub-title: First to Have a Second Chance
programme.desc: Rayna feels conflicted about leaving the kids to go back on tour; Will is concerned when he catches Layla flirting; Teddy uses his power to find a recent flame; Sadie runs into an ex.

programme.title: Nashville
programme.sub-title: I'm Not That Good at Goodbye
programme.desc: Rayna's daughters -- and Luke -- don't take the news of the canceled wedding very well; Avery and Juliette encounter a few bumps as they adjust to married life; Sadie purchases a gun; Deacon gets bad news about his condition.

programme.title: Nashville
programme.sub-title: I've Got Reasons to Hate You
programme.desc: Rayna brushes off rumors about her and Luke's breakup as she prepares to return to the stage; Scarlett plans a surprise for Deacon; Gunnar travels to Austin intent on mending fences with his estranged nephew.

programme.title: Nashville
programme.sub-title: I'm Lost Between Right and Wrong
programme.desc: Rayna finds out about Jeff Fordham's plan to sign Maddie to Edgehill; Luke and Gunnar write revenge songs and go carousing with a cautious Will; Sadie is tormented by her ex; Deacon's attempts to hide his illness causes him to push Maddie away.

programme.title: Nashville
programme.desc: After Rayna reveals Jeff's indiscretions to the board members, Edgehill Republic begins to fall apart; Deacon considers a clinical trial; Scarlett reconnects with Gunnar; Juliette poses for a magazine spread.

programme.title: Nashville
programme.desc: Rayna asks Deacon and her daughters to perform with her at the anniversary celebration of her induction into the Grand Ole Opry; Will is uncomfortable with the songwriter he is asked to collaborate with; Sadie reveals her battle to the world.

programme.title: Nashville
programme.sub-title: I Can't Keep Away From You
programme.desc: Deacon becomes frustrated when Rayna refuses to let him wallow; Scarlett is wary of performing again; Will's writing partner suddenly becomes unavailable; Sadie ends up in a dangerous situation.

programme.title: Nashville
programme.sub-title: This Just Ain't a Good Day for Leavin'
programme.desc: Rayna plans a star-studded baby shower for Juliette, but gets distracted by Sadie's drama; Luke and Bucky both hope to sign Ron Pope, a rising singer-songwriter; Gunnar is upset as Scarlett and Dr. Rand grow closer.

programme.title: Nashville
programme.desc: Jeff is forced to revisit his past when he is faced with his ex-fiancee (Christina Aguilera); Maddie struggles with the news about Deacon's illness; after the birth of her daughter, Juliette is eager to get back to work.

programme.title: Nashville
programme.desc: Nashville's brightest stars come together to support Teddy's music education initiative; Deacon gets a life-changing call as he prepares to take the stage with Rayna, Maddie and Daphne.

programme.title: Nashville
programme.desc: Rayna tries to help Deacon; Jade (Christina Aguilera) throws a party at her house that turns into an all-night bash; Juliette wants to reinvigorate her career with an impromptu rooftop concert; Gunnar receives news that changes everything.

programme.title: Nashville
programme.desc: While Juliette enjoys the attention following her rooftop performance, her team worries she is suffering from postpartum depression; Will learns his private life is about to be splashed across a tabloid; Deacon and Rayna grapple with his diagnosis.

programme.title: Nashville
programme.sub-title: Before You Go Make Sure You Know
programme.desc: When Juliette becomes so focused on her album that she puts it ahead of everything else, Avery makes a major decision; Rayna and the girls stand by Deacon as his life hangs in the balance.

programme.title: Nashville
programme.desc: Juliette hits a career high, including singing a duet with Steven Tyler, but her personal life plummets; Avery takes care of baby Cadence at his parents' home in Texas; Rayna deals with the aftermath of Deacon's liver transplant.

programme.title: Nashville
programme.desc: Juliette's pattern of volatile behavior continues with her breaking down during a TV interview; Rayna works to sign a rock star to Highway 65 to prove the label isn't just a vanity project.
